label.description: Character or expression of text to be plotted

fontcolor.description: A character value specifying text fontcolor.Default value is \code{fontcolor = "black"}

fontsize.description: A numeric specifying text fontsize in points.Default value is \code{fontsize = 12}

rot.description: A numeric specifying the angle to rotate the text.Default value is \code{rot = 0}

check.overlap.description: A logical value to indicate whether to check forand omit overlapping text. Default value is \code{check.overlap = FALSE}

plot.description: Input plotgardener plot to internally place text relative to

x.description: A numeric vector or unit object specifying text x-location

y.description: A numeric vector or unit object specifying text y-location

just.description: Justification of text relative to its (x, y) location.If there are two values, the first value specifies horizontaljustification and the second value specifies vertical justification.Possible string values are: \code{"left"}, \code{"right"},\code{"centre"}, \code{"center"}, \code{"bottom"}, and \code{"top"}.Default value is \code{just = "center"}

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to use if\code{x} or \code{y} are only given as numerics or numeric vectors.Default value is \code{default.units = "native"}

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} objectcontaining relevant function parameters
